about_the_game:
Notice: 100% of 11 bit studios and Dead Mage's proceeds go to the Humane Society International charity!

Children of Morta: Paws and Claws has raised more than 460 000 $ for all animals in need since its release.



Hunters of the night, creatures of the day. They howl, growl, hiss and grumble - but more than anything, they feel and think in a similar way that we all do. And their lives are as precious as ours. This DLC adds new features to the game - like the Animal Shelter System, new boosts, animations and events - but it actually does far more than that. It directly helps the animals in need - not those virtual, but the real ones. 100% of 11 bit studios and Dead Mage proceeds from Paws and Claws DLC go to the Humane Society International charity, whose main mission is to help animals all over the world.



Paws and Claws DLC - key new features:
- Animal Shelter System - which adds a whole new section of the house!
- A herd of varied animals visited the family’s house: deer, fox, birds and more.
- New mechanic: use treats to feed animals and look after them.
- New special animal-related boosts (XP Gain, Movement Speed and more) available for the Bergsons.
- New Home Interactive Events
- More than 100 new animations, big and small, showing you the life of your new animal friends!
detailed_description:
Notice: 100% of 11 bit studios and Dead Mage's proceeds go to the Humane Society International charity!

Children of Morta: Paws and Claws has raised more than 460 000 $ for all animals in need since its release.



Hunters of the night, creatures of the day. They howl, growl, hiss and grumble - but more than anything, they feel and think in a similar way that we all do. And their lives are as precious as ours. This DLC adds new features to the game - like the Animal Shelter System, new boosts, animations and events - but it actually does far more than that. It directly helps the animals in need - not those virtual, but the real ones. 100% of 11 bit studios and Dead Mage proceeds from Paws and Claws DLC go to the Humane Society International charity, whose main mission is to help animals all over the world.



Paws and Claws DLC - key new features:
- Animal Shelter System - which adds a whole new section of the house!
- A herd of varied animals visited the family’s house: deer, fox, birds and more.
- New mechanic: use treats to feed animals and look after them.
- New special animal-related boosts (XP Gain, Movement Speed and more) available for the Bergsons.
- New Home Interactive Events
- More than 100 new animations, big and small, showing you the life of your new animal friends!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHZ Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video card recommended
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video card recommended
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
